item.description:
You're invited to come train at Mixed Martial Arts school (think UFC or CageFighting)...."South Shore SportFighting and Fitness" at 104 Longwater Drive, Unit 104, Norwell, MA in Assinippi Park. 

http://www.sssfighting.com/teams/?u=SSSFIGHTING&s=htosports&t=c

This is the best workout to get out aggression and stress! Throw on some gloves and punch it out!

Bill Mahoney of South Shore Sportsfighting is offering this class to us for $10 person!! (CASH ONLY and PLEASE bring exact change)

We will be trained like the beginner kickboxing and cardio classes & class will be led by certified crossfit traines.  After a brief warmup with some jogging, squats, jumping jacks... to get us moving and ready to go!
We'll have some instruction on how to properly kick and punch, then practice with holding mitts for each other and using bags. I've even learned how to a choke hold the right way and some grappling moves.
But don't worry you won't get punched in the face! It's just about fitness and fun.
You will sweat and this is a GREAT workout, but even more fun! And a very inexpensive way to try something new.

Plan on bringing:
Water
a towel (remember you WILL sweat!)
If you have them, gloves, wraps & shin pads, but they do have loaners if not
**$10 CASH, EXACT CHANGE PLEASE!**

A great attitude to have fun! :)


GUESTS ARE WELCOME!

This event is open to up to 35 members!
We will need at least 10 people for this event to be held.

Please update your RSVP by Friday March 23rd at 4pm so I can give a final count to Bill.

And if you show up early, the kids class ends at 12:30 if you want to watch them fight it out too!  :)
item.how_to_find_us: inside the studio- **NO STREET SHOES ON THE MATS!!!***

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Mixed Martial Arts Event!
